name: digital-store
description: A modern e-commerce store for selling digital products like design code and assets

scripts.find-admin-ip: node -e "require('https').get('https://ifconfig.me', res => { let data = ''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => console.log('Your public IP:', data.trim())); });"
scripts.admin-ip-setup: echo "ğŸ” Admin IP Setup Helper" && echo "========================" && echo "" && echo "ğŸ“ Development: 127.0.0.1,::1,localhost" && echo "ğŸŒ Your Public IP:" && npm run find-admin-ip && echo "" && echo "ğŸŒ Online IP checkers:" && echo "â€¢ https://whatismyipaddress.com/" && echo "â€¢ https://ipinfo.io/" && echo "" && echo "ğŸ“ Add your public IP to .env:" && echo "ALLOWED_ADMIN_IPS=127.0.0.1,::1,localhost,YOUR_PUBLIC_IP"
